class.rdfs:comment: Specifies a location feature by providing a structured value representing a feature of an accommodation as a property-value pair of varying degrees of formality.
class.rdfs:label: LocationFeatureSpecification

schema:hoursAvailable.rdfs:comment: The hours during which this service or contact is available.
schema:hoursAvailable.rdfs:label: hoursAvailable

schema:validFrom.rdfs:comment: The date when the item becomes valid.
schema:validFrom.rdfs:label: validFrom

schema:validThrough.rdfs:comment: The date after when the item is not valid. For example the end of an offer, salary period, or a period of opening hours.
schema:validThrough.rdfs:label: validThrough
